channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Trump should forget about corporate tax cuts in his first 100 days
item.description: Corporate tax cuts are inflationary and could spell trouble for Republicans in the 2026 election.

item.title: Here’s how the ‘MAGA Seven’ stocks are doing on the first full day of Trump presidency

item.title: Crypto Thought Trump Would Bring It Legitimacy. Then He Launched a Meme Coin.
item.description: Industry players worry the success of the president’s meme coin will undermine the credibility they have worked hard to cultivate.

item.title: Mexico's Peso Gives Back Inauguration Day Gains

item.title: Tesla’s ‘Trump bump’ fades as stock falls alongside rest of EV sector
item.description: Investors still expect Musk to benefit more broadly from Trump 2.0.

item.title: Gold Futures Rise, Recouping Losses on Safe-haven Demand
item.description: Gold futures rose, reversing losses incurred earlier in the session, as investors have turned to gold as a safe-haven given the lack of clarity around...

item.title: Trump may use Medicaid cuts to fund tax reform. These states would be hit hardest.
item.description: President Donald Trump has long proposed cutting Medicaid, which covers healthcare for lower-income Americans.

item.title: Goldman Sachs Promotes Its Next Generation of Leaders
